title: I'm Doin' Fine Now (album)
text:
I'm Doin' Fine Now is the debut <a href="studio%20album">studio album</a> recorded by American male vocal quartet <a href="New%20York%20City%20%28band%29">New York City</a>, released in 1973 on the <a href="Chelsea%20Records">Chelsea</a> label.
Singles.
The album features the <a href="I%27m%20Doin%27%20Fine%20Now">title track</a>, which peaked at No. 17 on the <a href="Billboard%20Hot%20100">Billboard Hot 100</a>, No. 14 on the <a href="Hot%20Soul%20Singles">Hot Soul Singles</a> and No. 8 on the <a href="Adult%20Contemporary%20%28chart%29">Adult Contemporary</a> chart. Also featured are two other chart singles: "Make Me Twice the Man" and "Quick, Fast, in a Hurry".
